channel.title: [PI] click button/item while dead - Help
channel.description:
1. My dragon scimi if you spec someone then the prayer will turn off, so i speced my friend on my server his prayer turned off, so his 'Protect Item' is off, so i can win his ags.
And now Unfortunately, while he dying he clicked again on the 'protect Item' and didn't lost it. ::S
I need ur help, need a code for this:
If player are dying he cannot click any button. Especially the Prayer Tab 'Buttons'
2. Need another code for this:
I was fighting me friend I speced him 80 with with my ags, and he died, and while he dying he dropped 2 good items. So i have no good loot. This is bug.
I need the code you cannot drop items while dying.
Finsh. Hope you give me the 2 codes and tell me for which class i put them, and thanks alot.
I'll repp++
*** I got idea for dropping items while dead, can you give me code:
" You must be 10 seconds out of being in combat to drop items. "

item.title: [PI] click button/item while dead - Help
item.dc:creator: @Bhpk Bhpk
item.description:
@Bhpk wrote:

[quote=“The7thSanctum, post:4, topic:522018”]Add a timer so that their prayers won’t activate when they’ve been hit, simple enough.

For the second, look for where dropping items are handled and add something like:

if (c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You cannot drop items while in the Wilderness"); return; }[/quote]But i want players can drop anything in the wilderness but, i want to add like 30 Id that players cannot drop this item.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] click button/item while dead - Help
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

Add a timer so that their prayers won’t activate when they’ve been hit, simple enough.

For the second, look for where dropping items are handled and add something like:

if (c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You cannot drop items while in the Wilderness"); return; }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] click button/item while dead - Help
item.dc:creator: @Bhpk Bhpk
item.description:
@Bhpk wrote:

[quote=“Roblix, post:2, topic:522018”]Ill fix both for 10$[/quote]I’m not giving $0.5 for games, and i don’t have, and i wait for other they may can help me. I posted this on Rune-Server/Runlocus

So?? Why i give you $10

I hope you help me without giving $$

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] click button/item while dead - Help
item.dc:creator: @Roblix Roblix
item.description:
@Roblix wrote:

Ill fix both for 10$

Read full topic
